short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a beautiful blog in minutes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install the WordPress.com Chrome app and start blogging or checking out great content as fast as you can open a new tab.

From photoblogs to full blown company websites, promoting your band to sharing your thoughts, WordPress.com makes creating beautiful websites and blogs about as easy as it gets, and is powerful and flexible enough to grow with you, whatever your needs.

With a community millions strong, from cat blogs to CNN, you’ll never be short of something to read or share. Find and follow your favorite blogs through your personal Reader, or browse the cream of the crop through our editors’ daily selection at Freshly Pressed.

Installing the WordPress.com chrome app gives you a handy button on your “new tab” page to jump right into blogging or checking out the latest new posts from your Reader.

With over 150 fully customizable design themes and a range of custom fonts, you can count on creating a one-off, beautiful site whether you’re showing off your wedding photos, promoting your restaurant, or just sharing your thoughts. Once you have it up and running, your easy-to-read site stats make tracking your success a piece of cake.
